title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 1890 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 11, 2016

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 1890





	On Wednesday, May 11, 2016, the President signed into law:

	S. 1890, the "Defend Trade Secrets Act of 2016," which amends the Economic Espionage Act to allow private parties to seek civil remedies in Federal court for trade secret misappropriation.
